events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store but I want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I do not want to keep it.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request related to a recent purchase not meeting expectations.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's case regarding the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent jacket purchase. Iâ€™m here to assist you.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm that the jacket is in its original condition for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 459821. The jacket is unused and still in original packaging, just doesn't fit me properly.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate the refund for your order number 459821. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email to you shortly.
That sounds good, thank you! I will wait for the shipping label and send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As you have confirmed receipt of your refund, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
